law.catch_line: No Collector, Receiver, or Holder of public money shall be eligible as Senator or Delegate, or to an...
law.text: No Collector, Receiver, or Holder of public money shall be eligible as Senator or Delegate, or to any office of profit, or trust, under this State, until he shall have accounted for, and paid into the Treasury all sums on the books thereof, charged to, and due by him.
